net.letscode.game.api.zone.twod

Class Zone2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.letscode.game.api.zone.Zone
      • net.letscode.game.api.zone.twod.Zone2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JsonSerializable, TargetedSerializable<Entity>, EventBusProvider

    public class Zone2D
extends Zone
    Defines a Zone in which entities are placed in a continuous 2d plane.
    Author:
    timothyb89

    • Method Detail

      • addEntity

        public void addEntity(Entity entity)
        Adds the entity to the current zone. In addition to the actions performed by Zone's addEntity(), this also creates an EntityData2D instance and appends it to the entity map.
        Overrides:
        addEntity in class Zone
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity to add
        See Also:
        Zone.addEntity(Entity)

      • removeEntity

        public void removeEntity(Entity entity)
        Description copied from class: Zone
        Removes the given entity from this zone. This will fire a ZoneExitedEvent, though it may be extended by subclasses to provide additional information.

        Note that all zone addition and removal logic resides in this class; any methods that may exist in Entity or World are essentially wrappers around this method unless other functionality is otherwise noted.

        Overrides:
        removeEntity in class Zone
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity to remove from the zone
        See Also:
        Zone.addEntity(Entity), Zone.fireZoneExitedEvent(Entity)

      • move

        public void move(Entity e,
        Point pos)
        Moves the specified entity to the given position within this zone.
        Parameters:
        e - the entity to move
        pos - the new location for the entity
